title: Cyphe
description: contextual yet personalized, horizonless encyclopedia. we developed a model that weaves llm content with wikipedia, twitter, reddit and memes while tracking user engagment to provide infinite addictive science content via app.

title: Excalidraw AI
description: generate and edit flowcharts with AI.

title: Reforest NYC
description: Community-centered geospatial platform for optimizing urban reforestation with interactive mapping, environmental impact visualization, and collaborative planning across NYC.

title: Robot Deformables
description: Robotics research platform using multi-modal reinforcement learning, computer vision, and haptic feedback for training robots to manipulate deformable objects.

title: Really Cheap Flight Finder
description: Flight search platform using graph-based algorithms and multi-city route optimization to find the cheapest flight combinations with automated deal alerts.

title: Osler
description: 3rd Place at RuHealthHack - AI-powered hospitalist onboarding app with RAG system for hospital guidelines, scheduling, and administrative tools using Google Gemini.

title: Aura
description: Enterprise AI analytics platform with conversational intelligence for retail management, featuring Snowflake integration and predictive analytics for inventory and sales forecasting.

title: Mesh
description: 1st Place at Rutgers X Fiserv - Knowledge management platform transforming unstructured data into queryable knowledge graphs with AI-powered semantic search.

title: Vault
description: Secure team collaboration platform with AES-256 encrypted messaging, role-based access control, and audit logging for enterprise compliance.

title: Contextualized-Multi-Modal-RAG-Feedback-Loop
description: Advanced RAG system with self-healing feedback loops using GPT-4 for personalized query optimization and improved search accuracy through contextual learning.

title: BATMAN: Protect your City
description: Civic intelligence platform with real-time crime mapping, incident reporting, and automated SMS alerts to enhance public safety awareness.

title: GIST
description: GitHub repository analysis tool using OpenAI for automated code analysis, dependency mapping, and documentation generation to streamline repository assessment.

title: PLANA
description: AI-powered business plan analysis platform with financial modeling, automated SWOT analysis, and predictive forecasting for strategic recommendations.

title: GPT 3.5 4 Devs
description: Open-source GPT enhancement framework with modular architecture for AI-powered task automation, featuring web scraping, document processing, and Streamlit dashboard.

title: Helios
description: AI-powered haptic navigation device using computer vision and NLP for object detection and spatial guidance to assist visually impaired users.

title: ARGlasses
description: Augmented reality iOS app for virtual eyewear try-on using ARKit with real-time face tracking and photorealistic 3D rendering.

title: Cone
description: PHP application for sharing social media and contact information via QR codes with automatic generation and shareable links.

title: Inexpensive Enhanced One Factor Authentication
description: Logistic regression model that predicts malicious login attempts to enhance authentication security without traditional two-factor methods.

title: ELO Algorithm Based NFL Predictor
description: ELO ranking system that analyzes historical NFL data to rank teams and predict game outcomes.

title: Congress Connect
description: iOS app using sentiment analysis and machine learning to analyze congressional tweets and reveal politicians' views on various subjects.

title: Around-The-Pipe Audio Based Water Tracker for Home Residents
description: Published research using supervised machine learning and audio analysis to measure real-time water flow through household pipes.

title: CourseTurtle
description: Educational startup platform that simplifies course schedule analysis and sharing for students and teachers with accessible data visualization.

title: QuickEstimate
description: 3rd Place 2021 Congressional App Challenge - iOS app using computer vision to scan and price household items for insurance estimation.

title: WHRHS New Tab Extension
description: Chrome extension pre-installed on 2000+ WHRHS student Chromebooks providing a custom new tab experience.

title: The Power of Artificial Intelligence
description: TedX talk on the applications and future of Artificial Intelligence.

title: Virtual Note
description: 3rd Place 2019 Repl.IT Competition - Web-based music composition tool for intuitive digital music creation.

title: Business Meeting Summarizer
description: NLP-powered tool that converts meeting audio to text and generates extractive summaries to condense key discussion points.

title: Insem Camera Foot Traffic Counter
description: Computer vision project using YOLO to detect and count people in real-time from public security camera feeds for foot traffic analysis.
